title: Just got permanently banned for no reason lol
body: So I tried to log in on this account today, to see that I had been permanently banned for some reason. They are supposed to send you an email explaining the situation and why you were banned, I received no such email. On top of that, I rarely ever play on this account, maybe once every month or so, maybe more. So I have literally no idea why I would be banned. Absolutely ridiculous. I don't even talk in my games, I mute everyone at the start of the games, just listen to music, and play. That's it. Riot needs to fix this ASAP.

replies.body:
> Riot needs to fix this ASAP.

It was to protect your account. Contact Player Support.
Where do I go to do that? I have already submitted a ticket to riot support
That's the one. They will get back with you as soon as they can, so try to be patient.
Ahhhhhh I really want to play on that account right now!! I hope they can get back to me soon. Otherwise I'm just stuck watching Inuyasha :(
They'll answer you before you can get very far, there are a lot of episodes :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EFyAwszP,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-04-07T22:49:28.598+0000)
>
> It was to protect your account. Contact Player Support.

How long until riot support gets back with me?

It might take a couple days. Depends on how much is in their queue in front of you. And speaking of the queue, don't comment on your ticket or try to 'bump' it, because that'll actually put it back to the end of the queue.

Even if you're lucky and they get back to you fairly quickly, they're likely going to need to get information from you and verify all of that before you get your account back (you'll likely be going through some of the account recovery steps, given Tantram said it was to protect your account. Sometimes when they detect suspicious behavior on an account, they preemptively lock it down so the account can be secured).
Well that's depressing

Maybe try to be a little more grateful since they did that to PROTECT your account.

So stop whinying and wait for their answer.

That's part of the business model.......if the support is slow/bad they hope you will make an alt account in the mean time and buy  ip/xp boosts, skins, the champions etc.  If they hook you on a new account you are even more likely to spend money.  Ik this will get down voted by the riot lovers, but you have to admit....management at riot knows they are understaffed for the amount of tickets they get. Hell, even the cut, copy, paste brigade at riot takes roughly 10-36 hours to respond.

Why would{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  people downvote this? lol he just asked for support and didnt even show any negativity! People please xD

> [{quoted}](name=risenSKylirious,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EFyAwszP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-04-07T22:51:50.597+0000)
>
> Why would{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  people downvote this? lol he just asked for support and didnt even show any negativity! People please xD

It's best to stay factual and concise when making a post, if you care about upvotes. This guy chose the ridiculously immature title "just got permanently banned for no reason lol"  ... really? No reason at all? He clearly didn't know the reason, so why say no reason? And then lol? Why is it funny? Why would you laugh at loud while telling people about your problem? Why go into detail on how he never chats and plays on the account? I don't know... these are all things that people might downvote for. Just comes off as a whiney, premature, attention seeking post. He could easily wait for a response from support. Meh I didn't downvote, these are just reasons I can think of.
3rd party scripts, calling it now.
Nope, it got locked to protect his account from something; get rekt m8.

I feel you man because I scripted in one custom game 2 years ago, and it crashed the moment I got in game, but for some reason my computer won't give me access to uninstall it or manually erase the files. Now every account is a ticking time bomb, and I have 4 banned accounts for it. I swear I've never scripted since that one game, but 500$ of money down the drain, many riot support tickets, and 3 suicide attempts later, and they won't even give me the time of day to try and fix it. I just keep getting the same "We have reviewed the misconduct on your accounts and believe that the charges were fairly made" Just got my fourth account banned by leaving it on when I went on a weekend trip to Georgia, and came back to a "Player Banned" message. Thanks riot for all the times you screwed me for no reason.

I got hacked last year, and  the hacker was spamming my friends, I contacted Riot, they emailed me questions relating to the account, once i answered them they put my account on permanent suspension for a couple days to make sure the hacker or whatever didn't do anything bad to it, I got my account back when I checked in through email. So yea, I think it's just for security/protection :/
Send a support ticket?
Yeah I did, no reply yet
Just wait a bit then. They sometimes take a little bit of time to process tickets, and bumping it will send it to the back of the queue. :)
It should be unbanned. It must have been a mistake.
